title: What matches Didoni?
content:
I would be grateful for some suggestions.

I'm looking for typefaces which might complement a strong all-caps Didoni title/logo:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/didoni/urw-d-normal/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417052804/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/didoni/urw-d-normal/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/didoni/urw-d-normal/")

This is for a web-magazine with an academic/literary bent, so anything that might work for headings, sub-headings and the like would be useful!

Thanks very much!
author: hulegu
